page.title: 17Employment
page.content: When we did a survey within our school we were surprised to find that almost a fifth of the Parents had{Jobs}which were in some way connected to the sea. In our particular area there was no very high rate of unemployment,in fact we were lucky because our rate is well below the national average,while only 15 miles away it is twice as high as ours. The{types}of jobs which people had were Seamen,Customs officers,Lorry drivers,Caterers,Light industrial work,and some were Agricultural workers,although this number had fallen and was still falling due to increasing mechanisation,of very large farms.
